mapper.insert: insert into archive_target (graduate_id, name, content, grade, creator, create_time) values (#{graduateId},#{name},#{content},#{grade},"10000",now())
mapper.select:
SELECT id, graduate_id AS graduateId, name, content, version, updater, grade, (select title from archive_graduate_require t1 where t1.id=t2.graduate_id) as graduateTitle FROM archive_target t2 WHERE deleted =0
and name like concat('%',#{query.name},'%')
and grade = #{query.grade}
and graduateTitle like concat('%',#{query.graduateTitle},'%')
order by id desc

SELECT id, number, graduate_id AS graduateId, name, content, version, updater, grade, (select title from archive_graduate_require t1 where t1.id=t2.graduate_id) as graduateTitle FROM archive_target t2 WHERE id = #{id}
